short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thelma Password Manager allows users to manage their online passwords.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thelma Password Manager for Google Chrome allows users to connect to their Thelma account to access existing personal and shared passwords and create new ones.
